name: Hypercardinator
author: D'Arcy Norman

sections.description:
Hypercardinates your site using css and webfont – thanks to Giles Booth for releasing the Chicago-like webfont ChiKareGo via a Creative Commons license at http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=3778

The plugin also tries to force images to render in Hypercardesque high-contrast black and white (but some images sneak through – namely thumbnails for embedded videos etc.)

It should work with any theme.
sections.installation:
1. In your site’s Dashboard > Plugins > Add New area, search for “Hypercardinator”.
  2. Click “Install”
  3. Click “Activate”
  4. There is no step 4

short_description: Hypercardifies your site using css and webfont.
